nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:paper","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Poem of True Love\",\"color\":\"light_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Quest Item\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Bring it to \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Juliette \",\"color\":\"yellow\"},{\"text\":\"in \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"The Park\",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\".\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Filled with poor punctuation and\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"misspellings, but its message is\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"profound.\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"* \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"Co-op Soulbound \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"*\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"POEM_OF_INFINITE_LOVE"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
